page.title: 16TEXTILE INDUSTRY
page.content: Courtaulds (Greenfield) mother plant is in Coventry.Courtaulds built their Greenfield factory in 1935.It opened in 1936.They make rayon fibro from wood pulp.Several chemicals are added to the wood pulp e.g.sulphuric acid, carbon disulphide.The rayon is used for making clothes,furnishing materials and surgical material.The rayon is dyed different colours.At present 550 people work at the factory.The only women workers are cleaners and laboratory technicians. During peak production (late1960's) 2500 workers were employed at the plant.The workers work 4 shifts,6a.m. -2p.m.,2p.m.-10p.m.,10p.m.-6a.m. and a mixed shift.They have several football pitches and a club house which is used by present workers and retired workers.Some us go to the club house for Kung Fu training.
